line.token: * This is a PHP library that handles calling reCAPTCHA.

* OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN
* Encodes the given data into a query string format
* @param $data - array of string elements to be encoded
* Submits an HTTP POST to a reCAPTCHA server
* Gets the challenge HTML (javascript and non-javascript version).
* This is called from the browser, and the resulting reCAPTCHA HTML widget
* is embedded within the HTML form it was called from.
* @param string $pubkey A public key for reCAPTCHA
* @param string $error The error given by reCAPTCHA (optional, default is null)
* @param boolean $use_ssl Should the request be made over ssl? (optional, default is false)
* @return string - The HTML to be embedded in the user's form.
# commented out to deal with error in DVWA - ethicalhack3r
# die ("To use reCAPTCHA you must get an API key from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin/create");
* A ReCaptchaResponse is returned from recaptcha_check_answer()
* Calls an HTTP POST function to verify if the user's guess was correct
* @param array $extra_params an array of extra variables to post to the server
"To use reCAPTCHA you must get an API key from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin/create"
"For security reasons, you must pass the remote ip to reCAPTCHA"
* gets a URL where the user can sign up for reCAPTCHA. If your application
* has a configuration page where you enter a key, you should provide a link
* @param string $domain The domain where the page is hosted
* @param string $appname The name of your application
"To use reCAPTCHA Mailhide, you need to have the mcrypt php module installed."
/* gets the reCAPTCHA Mailhide url for a given email, public key and private key */
"To use reCAPTCHA Mailhide, you have to sign up for a public and private key, "
* gets the parts of the email to expose to the user.
* the email is then displayed as john...@example.com
* Gets html to display an email address given a public an private key.
* to get a key, go to:
"', '', 'toolbar=0,scrollbars=0,location=0,statusbar=0,menubar=0,resizable=0,width=500,height=300'); return false;\" title=\"Reveal this e-mail address\">...@"
